monet.models.camx.open_dataset(fname, earth_radius=6370000, convert_to_ppb=True, drop_duplicates=False)¶

Method to open CMAQ IOAPI netcdf files.

Parameters:
  • fname (string or list) – fname is the path to the file or files. It will accept hot keys in strings as well.
  • earth_radius (float) – The earth radius used for the map projection
  • convert_to_ppb (boolean) – If true the units of the gas species will be converted to ppbV
Returns:
Return type:

xarray.DataSet

monet.models.fv3chem module¶

monet.models.fv3chem.calc_nemsio_pressure(dset)¶

Calculate the pressure in mb form a nemsio file xarray.Dataset. Currently a slow loop. Looking for a way to speed this up. Recommend not using this for large datasets. First subset your data and then use to not run out of memory

Parameters:dset (xarray.Dataset) – nemsio dataset opened
Returns:Description of returned object.
Return type:xarray.DataArray
monet.models.fv3chem.open_dataset(fname)¶

Open a single dataset from fv3chem outputs (nemsio or grib2 currently)

Parameters:fname (string) – Filename to be opened
Returns:Description of returned object.
Return type:xarray.Dataset
monet.models.fv3chem.open_mfdataset(fname)¶

Open a multiple files from fv3chem outputs (nemsio or grib2 currently)

Parameters:fname (string) – Filenames to be opened
Returns:Description of returned object.
Return type:xarray.Dataset

monet.models.hysplit module¶

HYPSLIT MODEL READER

class monet.models.hysplit.ModelBin(filename, drange=None, century=None, verbose=False, readwrite='r', fillra=True)¶

Bases: object

represents a binary cdump (concentration) output file from HYSPLIT
methods: readfile - opens and reads contents of cdump file into an xarray self.dset
Parameters:
  • filename (type) – Description of parameter filename.
  • drange (type) – Description of parameter drange.
  • century (type) – Description of parameter century.
  • verbose (type) – Description of parameter verbose.
  • readwrite (type) – Description of parameter readwrite.
  • fillra (type) – Description of parameter fillra.

Description of attribute zeroconcdates.

Type:type

Description of attribute nonzeroconcdates.

dataflag¶

Description of attribute dataflag.

Type:type
readfile¶

Description of attribute readfile.

Type:type
drange¶
filename¶
century¶
verbose¶
static define_struct()¶

Each record in the fortran binary begins and ends with 4 bytes which specify the length of the record. These bytes are called pad below. They are not used here, but are thrown out. The following block defines a numpy dtype object for each record in the binary file.

readfile(filename, drange, verbose, century, fillra=True)

Short summary.

Parameters:
  • filename (type) – Description of parameter filename.
  • drange (type) – [date1, date2] - range of dates to load data for. if [] then loads all data. date1 and date2 should be datetime ojbects.
  • verbose (type) – Description of parameter verbose.
  • century (type) – Description of parameter century.
  • fillra (type) – Description of parameter fillra.
Returns:

Description of returned object.
Return type:

type
monet.models.hysplit.open_dataset(fname)¶

Short summary.

Parameters:
  • fname (type) – Description of parameter fname.
  • earth_radius (type) – Description of parameter earth_radius.
Returns:

  • type – Description of returned object.
  • CHANGES for PYTHON 3
  • For python 3 the numpy char4 are read in as a numpy.bytes_ class and need to
  • be converted to a python
  • string by using decode(‘UTF-8’)
